name: Wheel of Life
description: Transform Your Life with the Wheel of Life AssessmentRate different areas of your life and set goals to improve low-rated ones. Reassess monthly and adjust goals accordingly to ensure continuous improvement and balance in life.Key FeaturesAssess your life: Evaluate different areas like career, relationships, health, and personal development.Visualize with graphs: Use charts to understand and track progress over time.Set SMART goals: Establish specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-
features: Assess your life:Evaluate different areas like career, relationships, health, and personal development.; Visualize with graphs:Use charts to understand and track progress over time.; Set SMART goals:Establish specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound goals.; Improve life areas:Take actionable steps to enhance low rated areas for growth and positive change.; What Is Notion?Notion is an all-in-one productivity tool that combines note-taking, task management, and project organization into a single platform.; What Are Notion Templates?Notion templates are pre-designed layouts that can be imported directly into your Notion workspace - saving you hours of time!; How Will I Receive This Template?After purchase, you will receive a link to duplicate this Notion template into your workspace. Instructions are included.; Do I Need To Pay for Notion?Not at all! You can create a Notion account completely free with no hidden costs.; Will the development of this template be supported over time?Absolutely. Every few months my templates receive updates and developments, and you can access them for free.
